content.text:
# Revolutionary Democratic Front (2006)

The Revolutionary Democratic Front () is a populist political party in El Salvador. It was founded in 2006 as a rightwing split from the Farabundo Marti National Liberation Front. The party received 0.95% of the vote in the 18 January 2009 legislative election.
External links
*[http://www.fdr.org.sv/ Official web site of the party]
